skill.name: agent.skills.Interrogate
skill.description:
To get a specific message information from a unit (a text message that is displayed in Sword gaming). The agent moves to the entity and get the needed information after a defined delay.
Gather information from a unit takes time. This delay depends on: - the affinity of the interrogated unit regarding to the agent's camp: the more the interrogated unit has affinity with the agent, the shortest it is to get the information (see delays in authoring tool). - the diplomacy matrix: an enemy cannot be interrogated if the force ratio of the agent (the interrogator) is low.

parameter.name: entity
parameter.description: The entity to get the information from.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: To enact the decision to move to the entity.
